teal.render.j3d

Class GridNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Group
          • javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup
            • teal.render.j3d.Node3D
              • teal.render.j3d.ShapeNode
                • teal.render.j3d.GridNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBoundingArea, HasColor, HasPosition, HasRotation, HasTransform, IsPickable, ShapeNode3D, TAbstractShapeNode, TNode, TNode3D, TSceneObject, TShapeNode

    public class GridNode
extends ShapeNode
    this provides a general Node for representing a rectangular grid of information, an indexed geometry array will be used for the geometry.

      void updateGeometry(GridIterator gItor, boolean setColor)
      Provides a simple interface for updating the node, the GridIterator is expected to supply the actual x,y & z values used within the grid.
